Detailees will serve in critical Human Resource-related support roles. This is a 6 month to 1 year detail. The detail is not a promotion opportunity.

title: STATISTICIAN
description: The Bureau of Economics seeks candidates for the position of Statistician. Statisticians work directly with BE staff economists to (1) provide economic analysis in support of antitrust and consumer protection investigations, litigations, and rulemaking; (2) advise the Commission, Congress, the President, and other agencies on the impact of regulations; and (3) conduct research on the functioning of markets in the economy. The position is for an initial 1-year term, renewable up to four years.
